languages.text: "Бог-Император не оставит верных своих. Мы близимся к выходу из этого лабиринта... я чувствую это всем сердцем".
"The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."
languages.original_text: "Бог-Император не оставит верных своих. Мы близимся к выходу из этого лабиринта... я чувствую это всем сердцем".

traits.locale_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake his faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."
"The God-Emperor will not forsake his faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."
"The God-Emperor will not forsake his faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."
"The God-Emperor will not forsake his faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

languages.text: “神皇不会抛弃祂虔诚的信徒，我们已经快要逃出这座迷宫了……我的整颗心都能感觉得到。”
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: “神皇不会抛弃祂虔诚的信徒，我们已经快要逃出这座迷宫了……我的整颗心都能感觉得到。”
“神皇不会抛弃祂虔诚的信徒，我们已经快要逃出这座迷宫了……我的整颗心都能感觉得到。”

languages.text: « L'Empereur-Dieu n'oubliera pas ceux qui lui seront restés fidèles. Bientôt, nous nous échapperons de ce labyrinthe... J'en suis persuadée. »
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur-Dieu n'oubliera pas ceux qui lui seront restés fidèles. Bientôt, nous nous échapperons de ce labyrinthe... J'en suis persuadée. »

languages.text: «El Dios Emperador no abandonará a Sus fieles. Nos acercamos a la salida de este laberinto... Lo siento en lo más hondo de mi corazón».
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: «El Dios Emperador no abandonará a sus fieles. Nos acercamos a la salida de este laberinto... Lo siento en lo más hondo de mi corazón».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下は彼の信徒を見放しはしない。まもなくこの迷宮から脱出する…絶対的な確信がある」
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下は彼の信徒を見放しはしない。まもなくこの迷宮から脱出する…絶対的な確信がある」
「神帝陛下は彼の信徒を見放しはしない。まもなくこの迷宮から脱出する…絶対的な確信がある」

languages.text: "Der Gottimperator wird Seine Gläubigen nicht im Stich lassen. Unsere Flucht aus diesem Labyrinth naht ... Ich spüre es mit ganzem Herzen."
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gottimperator wird Seine Gläubigen nicht im Stich lassen. Unsere Flucht aus diesem Labyrinth naht ... Ich spüre es mit ganzem Herzen."
"Der Gottimperator wird seine Gläubigen nicht im Stich lassen. Unsere Flucht aus diesem Labyrinth naht ... Ich spüre es mit ganzem Herzen."

languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake his faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, kendisine inananları terk etmez. Bu labirentten kurtulmamıza çok az kaldı, hissedebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "The God-Emperor will not forsake His faithful. We are nearing our escape from this labyrinth... I feel it with all my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator, kendisine inananları terk etmez. Bu labirentten kurtulmamıza çok az kaldı, hissedebiliyorum."
